resources.string: Name: James Rejieffer E. De Leon

A movie entitled 5 Centimeters per second. The movie tells of a love that\'s slowly torn apart because the lovers move further away, both in heart and home. It\'s underlying themes are beautifully incorporated into the story; about growing up, letting go of an unreachable past, and taking control of one\'s own life.

Garden of Words. I love everything about this movie, especially the art and the soundtrack which is absolutely breathtaking.The art and the plot fits perfectly together and how the story portrayed Rain as a key factor to connect everything, the protagonists\' relationship with each other and everything else.

This is a popular video game called Dota 2. This game played a huge role in my life because at some point in my life, this game became a tool for me to escape reality. I met a lot of awesome people through this game and I will be forever thankful to this game even though I love and hate this game at the same time.

HunterXHunter is one of my favorite anime series.The Chimera Ant Arc will always be my favorite arc because of the character development, because of how it portrayed Gon, the protagonist, slowly become a monster and Meruem, the Chimera Ant King, slowly become a human because of a Komugi.
Red Velvet, one of my favorite K-POP groups, I love how they show their talent and passion through music.
Twice, the first K-POP group that I listened to, Twice is the main reason why I am a K-POP fan now.
Rammee the Roamer, our pet hedgehog, I called him the Roamer because this cute little fellow will always escape his home and roam around our bedroom and come back a few hours or days later.
Our youngest dog, Sushi, this fat hotdog-shaped dog never fails to amuse me because whenever given a chance, he will eat his poop.
Our second dog, Elle, this dog will never hurt you as long as you have food for her. She will always steal food in our table which results of her being scolded by my mother.

Our eldest dog, Yukki, this dog will be the gentlest dog and at the same time the fiercest among the three. He doesn\'t like people aside from us and will always bark at our visitors that is why he needs a muzzle to prevent him from biting our visitors.
